title: Two Truths Prevail!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Hey, Nozomi. Isn’t it about time that we tell Ayumu the true Washi Washi? Mari feels somewhat guilty....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I was thinking about that too, but.... After she believed all we said so innocently like that, wouldn’t she be shocked to learn the truth?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Uuu, that’s also true~! This is so hard!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I wonder if there’s a way to say it without surprising her?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>....There’s something Mari has prepared as a last resort.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>W-, what is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What if we make the next Washi Washi we teach Ayumu an official upgrade to the normal Washi Washi called “Washi Washi NEXT”?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>“Washi Washi NEXT”!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>This way, the Washi Washi that Ayumu knows would also be a true Washi Washi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>That might be a good idea....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
